Biggest piece of shit game i have ever played. I cant believe i actually looked forward to this for 3 months. Let me tell you why it sucks. The biggest reason is because it does not save your game, eventho it says it does. I started playing this morning and got really far and later on i started playing again but only to find out that only about 50% of what i had done that morning was saved. The story is alrite but the gameplay is terrible. You run around in a linear world with 1 goal, to kill as many Trojans/Greeks as you can. It was fun for about 1 minute then it started getting old. And now about 4 hours later after just doing the same thing over and over again its still old and boring. The games makes you think its a nonlinear game but you can ONLY walk on roads and sometimes in the water. Never on little hills or on grass or anything like that. Save your dual layer discs and download something else.
